projects.name: Olympic Ticket Hub
projects.description: Olympic Ticket Hub is a Django-based site for buying tickets to the 2024 Olympics. Users can view events, select tickets, and pay securely online. Admin features include sales tracking and ticket management, showcasing web dev skills.

projects.name: Ecmosgotchi
projects.description: Ecmosgotchi was my very first project, created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is a virtual pet game where you take care of your pet by feeding it, playing games, and keeping it happy. This project helped me learn the fundamentals of web development and sparked my passion for coding.

projects.name: Hafeze Cuisine
projects.description: Hafeze Cuisine is a takeaway restaurant serving Italian, Mauritian, and Indian dishes. Enjoy authentic flavors like pasta, pizza, seafood, curries, and breads. Order online for a convenient, high-quality dining experience at home.

projects.name: Tendy-Paris
projects.description: Trendy Paris was a Shopify-based e-commerce project focused on ready-to-wear fashion. The store showcased a curated selection of trendy and chic apparel, embodying the essence of style. Launched to deliver quality and accessible fashion, it operated successfully until December 2023.

studiesSection.subText: What I have studied so far

experienceSection.subText: What I have done so far

heroSection.description_one: I'm a full-stack developer based in Toulouse, FR.
heroSection.description_two: I have developed many types of full-stack from well known Works applications to Ecommerce shops.
heroSection.description_three: I'm passionate about IA, Web design and intuitively implemented UI and UX.

aboutSection.description: After five years of working in a field that didn’t align with my true interests, I made the decision to follow my passion and pursue a career in full-stack development. The world of coding, problem-solving, and creating digital solutions has always fascinated me. This passion drove me to take the leap and invest in learning the skills necessary to build dynamic, user-friendly applications. Today, I’m proud to say that I’ve successfully transitioned into a field that not only excites me but also allows me to grow and thrive as a full-stack developer.

worksSection.description: Explore a selection of my projects showcasing my skills in web development and design. Each project highlights my ability to create functional, user-friendly, and visually appealing solutions.
worksSection.description_two: Click on the project cards to view more details and access the source code.
